jobs: FixViolation: Fix DLP-VW-04 missing history verification — update testSpec entry to include history entry verification for drag-and-drop stage changes, and update the Playwright test to navigate to deal detail page and verify a history entry was created
RunTests: Verify tests pass after DLP-VW-04 history fix
DocumentFix: Document the DLP-VW-04 history verification fix

FixViolation: Fix stage naming inconsistency — standardize 'Proposal Sent' label in DealsPipelineView and DealHistorySection to match DealStageBadge, DealsFilterControls, and CreateDealModal; also fix testSpec DLP-HDR-02 to say 'Proposal Sent' instead of 'Proposal'
RunTests: Verify tests pass after stage naming fix

FixViolationCDPTestsIncomplete: Fix ClientDetailPage Playwright tests - fix incomplete field assertions in CDP-QA-02 (missing description/duedate/priority/deal), CDP-QA-04 (missing value/owner), CDP-ATT-01 (missing date/deal columns), fix CDP-ATT-02 (test download not just filename visibility), fix CDP-ATT-03 (test view button not delete button), fix CDP-TL-03 title mismatch, fix CDP-HDR-02 through CDP-HDR-05 to use atomic timeline assertions (count before/after instead of .not.toHaveCount(0))
FixViolationCDPTestsMissing: Add missing ClientDetailPage Playwright tests - CDP-QA-10 through CDP-QA-13 (cancel button tests), CDP-TL-04 through CDP-TL-08 (timeline entry format and atomicity tests)
RunTestsCDPTests: Verify tests pass after Playwright test fixes
